mapper.update: update user set user_account_number = #{userAccountNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_password = #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_nickname = #{userNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_state = #{userState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_create_time = #{userCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select user_id, user_account_number, user_password, user_nickname, user_state, user_create_time from user
